revised_title: Nature Conservation Objectives and Challenges in Great Britain
tldr: This article discusses the objectives and challenges of nature conservation in Great Britain. It highlights the importance of balancing land use for productivity and conservation, and the need for politicians and scientists to work together to address the competing demands for land. The author emphasizes the importance of increased efficiency in crop production and efficient use of land to make conservation possible.
